Song.title: Come Thou Fount (Fluharty Version)
Song.copyright: Arranged by Thomas Fluharty, Public Domain

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [Chord Run 4x]
VERSE 1: [D]Come Thou [D]Fount of every [A]blessing, Tune my [G]heart to [A]sing Thy [D]Grace [A]Streams of [D]mercy never [A]ceasing, Call for [G]songs of [A]loudest [D]praise Teach me [Bm]some melodious sonnet, Sung by [Bm]flaming [A]tongues a[G]bove Praise the [D]mount! I'm fixed u[A]pon it, Mount of [G]Thy re[A]deeming [D]love [2x Run]
VERSE 2: [A]Hither[D]to Thy love has [A]blest me, Thou hast [G]brought me [A]to this [D]place And I [D]know Thy hand will [A]bring me, Safely [G]home by [A]Thy good [D]grace Jesus [Bm]sought me when a stranger, Wandering [Bm]from the [A]fold of [G]God He to [D]rescue me from [A]danger, Inter[G]posed His [A]precious [D]blood [2x Run]
{new_page} VERSE 3: [A]O to [D]grace how great a [A]debtor; Daily [G]I'm con[A]strained to [D]be [A]Let Thy [D]goodness like a [A]fetter, Bind my [G]wandering [A]heart to [D]Thee Prone to [Bm]wander, Lord I feel it, Prone to [Bm]leave the [A]God I [G]love Here's my [D]heart, O take and [A]seal it, Seal it [G]for Thy [A]courts a[D]bove [2x Run]
VERSE 4: [A]O that [D]day when freed from [A]sinning, I shall [G]see Thy [A]lovely [D]face; [A]Clothed [D]then in blood-washed [A]linen, How I'll [G]sing Thy [A]sovereign [D]grace; [A]Come, my [Bm]Lord, no longer tarry, Take my [Bm]ransomed [A]soul a[G]way; Send Thine [D]angels now to [A]carry Me to [G]realms of [A]endless [D]day [4x Run]
{new_page} Tag: Jesus [Bm]sought me when a stranger, Wandering [Bm]from the [A]fold of [G]God He to [D]rescue me from [A]danger, Inter[G]posed His [A]precious [D]blood [Chord Run 4x]
Tag B: Interposed His precious Interposed His precious Interposed His precious Holy Blood[4x]
Ending-[Chord Run 4x]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 come thou fount of every blessing tune my heart to sing thy grace streams of mercy never ceasing call for songs of loudest praise teach me some melodious sonnet sung by flaming tongues above praise the mount im fixed upon it mount of thy redeeming love verse 2 hitherto thy love has blest me thou hast brought me to this place and i know thy hand will bring me safely home by thy good grace jesus sought me when a stranger wandering from the fold of god he to rescue me from danger interposed his precious blood verse 3 o to grace how great a debtor daily im constrained to be let thy goodness like a fetter bind my wandering heart to thee prone to wander lord i feel it prone to leave the god i love heres my heart o take and seal it seal it for thy courts above verse 4 o that day when freed from sinning i shall see thy lovely face clothed then in bloodwashed linen how ill sing thy sovereign grace come my lord no longer tarry take my ransomed soul away send thine angels now to carry me to realms of endless day tag jesus sought me when a stranger wandering from the fold of god he to rescue me from danger interposed his precious blood tag b interposed his precious interposed his precious interposed his precious holy blood ending
